detectors.description:
Miglio.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#171-181) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _gonBalances[to] = _gonBalances[to].add(gonValue) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#178)

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#77-80)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#82-86)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Miglio.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#155-161)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Miglio.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#163-169)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Miglio.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#171-181)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Miglio.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol#225-237)
private constant DECIMALS = 18; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol)#108
private constant MAX_UINT256 = ~uint256(0); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol)#109
private constant INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY = 10000000 * 10**DECIMALS; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol)#110
private constant TOTAL_GONS = MAX_UINT256 - (MAX_UINT256 % INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol)#112
private constant MAX_SUPPLY = ~uint128(0);  // (2^128) - 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Miglio.sol)#114
